statements.statement: SELECT PRODUCT_MODEL_CD modelCd FROM VM_CC_PRODUCT_MODEL WHERE TRIM(PRODUCT_MODEL_NM) LIKE TRIM(#modelNm#) || '%'

SELECT PROD.PRODUCT_MODEL_NM modelNm, PROD.ASSEMBLY_PATTERN_CD assemblyPatternCd, PROD.ASSEMBLY_PATTERN_SUB_CD assemblySubPatternCd FROM VM_CC_PRODUCT_MODEL PROD WHERE PROD.PRODUCT_MODEL_CD = #modelCd#
